bio: I am a self-taught Front-end Engineer with more than 2 years of industry experience. I am currently focusing on building both mobile and web applications using Flutter.

1.name: Digital Green
1.description: Worked on ReactJs web app and Flutter Android apps

2.name: Vrook
2.description: Designed and developed custom mobile-responsive themes for OpenEdX LMS.

3.name: Open Source
3.description: Completed Hacktoberfest'21 with 4 merged pull requests and also contributed to few opensource projects

1.name: Regalia '22 Backend
1.description: Backend of Regalia '22, RCCIIT's cultural fest. Handled total entries for 1.2K+ attendees on both the event days each. Also handled on-spot registrations (including sending passes through email using MAILGUN API) and free entries, without encountering a single production bug.

2.name: TechTrix '22 Backend
2.description: Made the backend of TechTrix '22, RCCIIT's tech fest. Handled 435+ participants, 60+ coordinators, and 560+ event registrations, without encountering a single production bug.

3.name: Calculator
3.description: Calculator app based on Soft UI (neumorphism), having simple and advanced modes. Also has a history section to save previously performed operations (using FLUTTER SQLITE). Supports 3 theme modes - system default, light and dark. State management approach used - RIVERPOD. PUBLISHED ON F-DROID.

4.name: flutter_dev_folio
4.description: Minimal, Beautiful and responsive portfolio site template.

5.name: roBOT - Discord bot
5.description: Bot with administrative commands (for kick, ban, mute, etc) and other fun commands (for memes, movies, jokes, etc).

6.name: cinephilic
6.description: A chrome extension for showing the current trending movies in new tab.

7.name: Dictionary
7.description: Multi-language dictionary app with support for audio pronunciation (English only).

8.name: Note
8.description: Simple terminal based Note Taking Application.

9.name: Enigma-tic-cryption
9.description: Follows the exact encryption method used by the enigma. Has multiple modes for setting different rotors.
